name: TechHive
description: WanderSEA is a tourism management system where user can see many places of inside and outside of the countries!
features: Access control for user, moderator and admin
Regular users can view their profile add a product and see the list of their added products
Users purchase memberships subscription through a payment system with or without discount to add more than one product

name: Meraki
description: Meraki is a community food sharing and surplus reduction platform designed to connect users for food sharing!
features: Users can donate food by filling up the form in Add A Food page
Manage my foods page to see, update and delete previously donated foods
Users can see their requested food from my requested foods

name: Serendipia
description: WanderSEA is a tourism management system where user can see many places of inside and outside of the countries!
features: Home page consisting of an attractive automatic slider with a typewriter showing the travel destination countries
List of countries we offer travel tour information about
Private routes for logged in users to view their profile, add a tour spot and see, update and delete their added spots
